name: Oxymoronia
description:
LORE:

You are a warrior of truth ridding the world of hypocrites.  Catch your foes in a contradictory statement to sentence them to death.


CONTROLS:

  • Main screen:
    • Click on the character portrait to fight them.
    • Click left or right of the portrait to scroll through.
  • Hangman screen:
    • Play hangman.
    • Other options may be available and will be marked.

CREDITS:

Song: https://megamaster.bandcamp.com/album/hills-and-mountains (used with permission)
